block.p: Pauline Joan Garris and Marshall William Brown III are to be married today by Rabbi Mordechai Waxman at Windows on the World, the New York restaurant.

The bride, 34, is the vice president of strategic planning and business development at the Estee Lauder Companies in New York. She graduated from Dartmouth College and received an M.B.A. degree from the University of Pennsylvania. She is a daughter of Barbara and Henry Garris of Great Neck, N.Y.
Pauline Joan Garris and Marshall William Brown III are to be married today by Rabbi Mordechai Waxman at Windows on the World, the New York restaurant.

The bride, 34, is the vice president of strategic planning and business development at the Estee Lauder Companies in New York. She graduated from Dartmouth College and received an M.B.A. degree from the University of Pennsylvania. She is a daughter of Barbara and Henry Garris of Great Neck, N.Y.

The bridegroom, 41, is an account manager in New York for Alliant Technologies, an Internet consulting company. He graduated from Dartmouth and received a master's degree in English from the University of Chicago. He is the son of Miriam L. Brown of Sayville, N.Y., and the late Mr. Brown Jr.
